item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: DownCity on Weybosset Street in Providence

DownCity has been around for a long time and is always a great time! It has a trendy and hip decor with a tasty and diverse menu. They boast a Meatloaf Monday which includes their award winning meatloaf with a medley of sides and a glass of wine for $15.50. NOW on Mondays they also have $2.00 drafts, $5.00 sangrias, $.50 Blazin' hot Wings, pizza by the slice for $2.50 and $10.00 pitchers of beer! ALSO featuring Karaoke at 9:00pm with the fabulous Miss Sabrina Blaze (what IS she doing with those straws?)! DownCity is a favorite with P-Collective members and I don't know about you, but Mondays seem to be getting a little wild over at DownCity and that can only mean one thing........Let's check it out! Sedately, of course. ;)

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing some kind of scarf - but we're hard to miss!
item.name: Monday Night Happy Hour - DownCity !
